---
category: news
title: "AI used to deter deer from railway tracks over festive period"
excerpt: "New Artificial Intelligence (AI) technology is hoping to deter deer from railway lines. The system has been successfully tested along a mile of track between Peterborough and Grantham, train operator LNER said. The automated deer deterrent system (Adds) uses sound and vision sensors to identify when a deer approaches the tracks."
